img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/50/Wukong_YellowFlower_45.jpg)
A new move he can employ will have him toss one of his swords straight at you, then dash to pick it up while slicing with his second blade as he slides by.
img_below_text:
Taking off one of his arms will deal a chunk of damage, but if you can try targeting both of his extra arms, removing them both will instantly deplete his health, and begin the second phase where demands a true fight: two arms vs two arms.
He's got a lot more aggressive moves for this phase, and you'll need to be a bit more cautious as he has a lot less openings to retaliate than before.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 45.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/50/Wukong_YellowFlower_45.jpg)
A new move he can employ will have him toss one of his swords straight at you, then dash to pick it up while slicing with his second blade as he slides by."
        - Following Text: "Taking off one of his arms will deal a chunk of damage, but if you can try targeting both of his extra arms, removing them both will instantly deplete his health, and begin the second phase where demands a true fight: two arms vs two arms.
He's got a lot more aggressive moves for this phase, and you'll need to be a bit more cautious as he has a lot less openings to retaliate than before."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist engaged in battle against a multi-armed enemy. The enemy appears to be retreating or repositioning while wielding multiple weapons, with sparks and energy effects surrounding the action. This moment aligns with the preceding text, which describes the enemy's ability to throw a sword and attack with another, and the following text, which details strategies for targeting the enemy's extra arms to deal significant damage and transition to a more aggressive second phase of the fight.
